name: astrobench-cli
description: JavaScript benchmarks in the web browser using Benchmark.js and Puppeteer

scripts.check: rm-j -rf coverage/* && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=coverage node --test --experimental-test-coverage test/text-formatter.js && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=coverage node --test --experimental-test-coverage test/json-formatter.js && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=coverage node --test --experimental-test-coverage test/checker.js && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=coverage node --test --experimental-test-coverage test/runner.js && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=coverage node --test --experimental-test-coverage ./bin/astrobench
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check
